title: Sekai Saikou no Ansatsusha, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei suru
original_name: 世界最高の暗殺者、異世界貴族に転生する
sinopse: When the greatest assassin of the era is killed, he awakens before a goddess who offers to reincarnate him into another world. However, she has one condition: he must assassinate the hero of that world.
